pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)15$(br)$(#bd951a)DPS:$()$(#ff0000)6.4 (8 DMG/1.25s)$(br)$(#bd951a)Range:$()$(#ff0000)15$(br)$(#bd951a)Seed Recharge Time:$()$(#ff0000)5s$(br2)$(#bd951a)How can a single plant grow and shoot so many peas so quickly? Peashooter says, "Hard work, commitment, and a healthy, well-balanced breakfast of sunlight and high-fiber carbon dioxide make it all possible."

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)Peashooters are your first line of defense. They shoot peas at attacking zombies.
